name: Semantic Images
description: Adds semantic information to images. For e.g. search engines.

property_name.label: Name
property_name.info: The name for this object. See: http://schema.org/ImageObject

property_caption.label: Caption
property_caption.info: The caption for this object. See: http://schema.org/ImageObject

property_dateCreated.label: Date created
property_dateCreated.info: The date on which the image was created i.e taken. See: http://schema.org/ImageObject

property_datePublished.label: Date published
property_datePublished.info: The date on which the image was published. See: http://schema.org/ImageObject

property_contentURL.label: Content URL
property_contentURL.info: Actual bytes of the image object, for example the image file.
